Interface Channel

public interface Channel

Represents a chat channel

getFormat

java.lang.String getFormat()
Gets the format messages in this channel appear in

Returns:
a format string, containing the placeholders %channel% (channel name), %player% (the display name of the player talking), and %ign% (the in-game name of the player talking)

setFormat

void setFormat(java.lang.String format)
Sets the format messages in this channel appear in

Parameters:
format - the format to set, containing the placeholders %channel% (channel name), %player% (the display name of the player talking), and %ign% (the in-game name of the player talking)

getRadius

int getRadius()
Gets the radius the messages in this channel are sent to

Returns:
the radius messages are sent to in blocks, or -1 if the messages are sent globally

setRadius

void setRadius(int radius)
Sets the radius messages in this channel are sent to

Parameters:
radius - the radius to set in blocks, or -1 if messages should be sent globally

getSpeakers
